name: Okko Hotels Paris Rosa Parks
description: OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks features a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Paris. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Gare du Nord Metro Station is 2.7 km from OKKO Hotels Paris Rosa Parks, while Gare du Nord is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Okko Hotels Paris Gare De L'est
description: Located in Paris, within 2.3 km of La Cigale Concert Hall and 2.7 km of Pompidou Centre, OKKO Hotels Paris Gare de l'Est provides accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, ticket service and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel each room has a wardrobe and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge. Guests will find a sauna, 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, a business centre and ironing service at the property. Opéra Garnier is 2.9 km from OKKO Hotels Paris Gare de l'Est, while Sacré-Coeur is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the hote

name: Solly Hôtel Paris
description: Solly Hôtel Paris is a 4-star luxury hotel located in the Marais district of Paris, surrounded by greenery, next to the Arts et Métiers Square. The property is decorated in an Art-Déco style with contemporary features. The Georges Pompidou Centre is a 10-minute walk away and the Notre-Dame Cathedral is 1.8 km from the hotel. Decorated in a contemporary style with modern furniture, all rooms and suites are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. There is also a minibar and private bathroom. Additional facilities include free WiFi access and a business corner. There is a vélib bike hire station opposite the property. Réamur-Sébastopol Metro Station is 50 metres away and Arts-et-Métier Metro Station is 200 metres from the accommodation. The Picasso Museum is 1.4 km from the hotel and Pont Neuf is 1.8 km away. Public parking facilities can be found only 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Mayflower Opera
description: Situated in the 8th district of Paris, just 18 minutes' walk from Opéra Garnier, Hôtel Mayflower Opéra offers accommodation with free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, desk or seating area and wardrobe. A coffee machine is also featured in the room. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Breakfast is served daily in the dining room. A number of restaurants can be reached within walking distance. Additional facilities include a 24-hour front desk at the property and the on-site bar. Sacré-Coeur is 1.6 km from Hôtel Mayflower Opéra, while Avenue des Champs-Elysées is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 17 km from the property. The nearest station is Rome Metro Station, a 2-minute walk away from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Pont Royal
description: Hotel Pont Royal offers elegant accommodation and free internet. It is located in the trendy Saint Germain des Prés area on Paris’s left bank, near art galleries and the Louvre. Guest rooms at the Hotel Pont Royal are air-conditioned. They include a minibar, safe, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite facilities. A full buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every day before work or sightseeing. Atelier St Germain de Joel Robuchon, the hotel’s restaurant, is internationally acclaimed and serves gourmet cuisine. The Pont Royal’s central location means guests can explore the city on foot or by Metro. Its rich history (it has welcomed famous artists and writers, including Albert Camus and Boris Vian) makes it the perfect place to experience this romantic city.

name: Hotel Regina Louvre
description: The luxurious Hôtel Regina Louvre is located in the heart of Paris in the fashion, shopping and museum district, overlooking the Louvre. It first opened in 1900 for the world's fair and is located opposite Tuileries Gardens. Designed in an elegant style with period furniture, the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and safe. Some rooms have views of Tuileries Gardens and the Louvre. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel and facilities for making coffee and tea can be found in each room. Both continental and buffet breakfasts are prepared every day. Children from 6 until 12 years old can enjoy the buffet breakfast at a reduced cost. Guests can enjoy French, seasonal cuisine at the restaurant Salon Rivoli and dine on the terrace on sunny days. You can relax with a refreshing drink in the lounge bar, which has a typical British decor or indulge with luxurious teas and pastries. Room service, a limousine service and a 24-hour reception with concierge are among the additional services available at this hotel. Pets under 6 kg are also welcome. The hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Tuileries Metro Station, which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier and the Champs-Elysees. Place Vendôme and its luxury boutiques are situated 750 metres away. The Musée d’Orsay is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Villa Lutece Port Royal
description: Situated in the heart of Paris 13th arrondissement, near the Jardin des Plantes and the National Library, is the very stylish Villa Lutèce Port Royal hotel. The Villa Lutèce features air-conditioned rooms that are stylishly decorated and equipped with a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a modern décor and a shower or a bath. Before venturing out to visit Paris, you can enjoy the breakfast buffet in the dining area. Room service is available all day and the hotel features a bar where guests can socialize over a drink. Staying at the Villa Lutèce Port Royal places you in the centre of the world's most visited city. In the surrounding area you will find a variety of restaurants that offer traditional and international cuisine, lively night life and many of the city's most famous sights.

name: Sinner Paris
description: Sinner is the first hotel in the Evok Hotels Collection to lay claim to a lifestyle of relaxed luxury, bringing boldness and the ultimate sophistication straight to the gates of Le Marais. Sinner is a location laden with many pasts. An area of multiple expressions among heritage, design and architecture. Inside, the designer Tristan Auer emphasizes the volumes with his atypical, highly visual combinations.Paris is free here.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Carina Tour Eiffel
description: Esteem Tour Eiffel is located in Paris’ 15th arrondissement, a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers individually decorated rooms, just a 5-minute walk from Charles Michels Metro Station. A safe and a work desk are basic facilities in all of the rooms at Esteem Tour Eiffel. Each has a TV with satellite channels and an en suite bathroom with amenities. Featuring a painted mural, the breakfast room serves fresh croissants every morning. Guests can also relax in the lounge and read one of the newspapers on offer. In the heart of the Beaugrenelle district, Esteem Tour Eiffel is a 7-minute walk from the Seine and 1.5 k from Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. Local transport links lead directly to Jardin des Plantes and the Sorbonne University. In the heart of the Beaugrenelle district, near the Seine riverfront and a stone's throw from the Eiffel Tower, our Parisian establishment welcomes you in a decor that combines comfort and authenticity during your trips to the capital. We pay particular attention to the relationship between our teams and you. Nestled in the heart of the Beaugrenelle/Saint-Charles district, surrounded by tourist monuments, quality restaurants and an exceptional shopping center, we are ideally located for your business and personal travels.

name: L'Hotel Pergolese Paris
description: L'Hotel Pergolese Paris is located 250 metres from the Palais des Congrés and less than a 10-minute walk from the Champs Elysées. This design hotel features air- conditioned rooms with an iPod docking station. Free WiFi access, satellite TV and tea and coffee making facilities are standard in each room. The marble bathrooms include bathrobes, and all of the rooms have a modern décor. Guests can relax in the hotel bar, which is open 24 hours a day. Breakfast is served every morning in the colourful dining room at L'Hotel Pergolese Paris. An express breakfast can also be served at a lower rate.

name: Hôtel Le Walt by Inwood Hotels
address: 37 Avenue De La Motte Picquet, 75007 Paris
description: Hotel Le Walt is a 4-star hotel located on the Rive Gauche in Paris’ 7th arrondissement. This design hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an option to have breakfast served in your room. Some rooms at Le Walt offer a view of the Eiffel Tower. Each is equipped with air-conditioning and a flat screen satellite TV. Rooms also feature a mini bar and radio. The Walt features a private garden terrace, where guests can relax with a drink or enjoy breakfast. Hotel Le Walt is a short walk from the Champ de Mars, l’Esplanade des Invalides and the Grand Palais. Pets are welcome throughout the hotel. An extra cost of 15€ per day per animal will be requested for pets weighing up to 10kg or a surcharge of 30€ for pets weighing more than 10kg.

name: Nolinski Paris
description: Nolinski Paris is set in the 1st arr. District in Paris, 500 metres from Tuileries Garden and within easy reach from the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré shopping area. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a spa with a pool, a sauna, a hammam and massage rooms. In the spa, guests can enjoy La Colline beauty products. The bright and spacious rooms and suites of Nolinski Paris are fitted with fine bedding, spacious wardrobes, plush carpets and rich curtains, and feature an elegant desk. Bathrobes and slippers are available for your comfort. Some rooms offer windows and balconies opening out onto the heart of Paris. Nolinski Le Restaurant offers guests the opportunity to enjoy dishes created by the hotel's executive chef, Philip Chronopoulos, whilst surrounded by decor by British designer John Whelan, who has combined Art Deco style with 1970s touches. The Grand Salon invites guests to relax with soothing teas, to sample Mediterranean dishes for lunch and dinner, or enjoy late-night cocktails. Nearby the property guests can enjoy a lunch or dinner at the Two-Michelin-Starred Palais Royal gourmet restaurant. Nolinski Paris reception staff are available 24/7. Louvre Museum and Opéra Garnier can be reached within 1 km of the hotel. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 15 km from Nolinski Paris.

name: Hotel Le Six
description: With a fitness centre and a spa with hammam, Hotel Le Six is a luxurious boutique hotel located in the heart of Paris. It is a 5-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre-Dame-des-Champs Metro Station. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning are basic facilities in rooms at Hotel Le Six. Each is contemporary in style and offers an en suite bathroom with luxury products, bathrobes and slippers. Blending cream and chocolate tones, a buffet breakfast is served in the elegant breakfast room. In the evening, guests can relax in one of the lounge bar’s armchairs and try a cocktail from the large menu. In the heart of the Latin Quarter, Hotel Le Six is 10 minutes from Saint-Sulpice and Saint-Germain-des-Près. Local transport leads directly to sights such as the Sacré Coeur, Place de la Concorde and Ile-de-la-Cité.

name: Best Western Empire Elysees
description: The Best Western Empire Elysées is located 600 meters from the Arc de Triomphe and Champs Elysées. It offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi Internet access. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a desk and bathrooms facilities. All guest rooms also have a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Some of the rooms have a balcony. A full buffet breakfast made with local products is served every morning. Guests may also choose to enjoy a continental breakfast in their room. Please note that breakfast is included for all our customers. The closest Metro is Ternes, which offers direct transport to the Moulin Rouge and Montmartre district of the city. The Best Western Empire Elysées is a 10-minute Metro ride to the business area of La Défense from Charles de Gaulle Etoile Metro Station, 450 m from the hotel. The Eiffel Tower is 2.6 km away. The whole team will be delighted to welcome you for your stay and will be at your disposal to advise you on the best places, museums, restaurants to see.bestwestern.com

name: Terrass Hotel
description: Le Terrass” Hôtel is set in a 19th century building in the heart of the Montmartre district. Just a 15-minute walk from the Sacré-Coeur Basilica, the 4-star hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms with air conditioning. Serviced by 3 lifts, all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi access, a minibar and a private bathroom. Guests can admire the Eiffel Tower when having breakfast on the rooftop terrace of Le Terrass” Restaurant Bar. Its panoramic terrace features large bay windows and offers clear views of Paris. A 24-hour front desk with concierge service is provided. Free internet facilities are available. Guests can explore the picturesque Montmartre district or go to the Moulin Rouge, which is 450 metres away. Metro Blanche (line 2) is 500 metres from the hotel and allows direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. The Grands Magasins department stores and Opéra are a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Mansart
description: Set on the on the corner of the prestigious Place Vendome, this hotel offers refined guest rooms with free WiFi access. It is a 5-minute walk from the Opéra Garnier. The air-conditioned guest rooms at the Mansart are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar. All rooms are decorated with antiques and include tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms feature a DVD player. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the elegant dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at hotel Mansart. A 24-hour front desk, newspapers and a laundry are provided. Opéra Metro Station is 350 metres away and provides access to the Louvre Museum. The Tuileries Garden is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hôtel Le Milie Rose
description: Situated in Paris and with Gare du Nord reachable within less than 1 km, Hôtel Le Milie Rose features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Gare de l'Est. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms come with a balcony and others also boast city views. At Hôtel Le Milie Rose rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near Hôtel Le Milie Rose include Pigalle Metro Station, La Cigale Concert Hall and Opéra Garnier. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Opéra Opal
description: Located in a chic district in central Paris, the 4-star hotel Hotel Opéra Opal is just 150 metres from the Madeleine Church. It has a 24-hour reception and offers stylish guest rooms with free Wi-Fi. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Each guest room at Opéra Opal is air-conditioned and has a private bathroom. An American breakfast is served every morning in the stylish breakfast room. After breakfast, guests can relax around the open fireplace in the cocktail lounge. Hotel Opéra Opal is 300 metres from the famous Printemps department store. Opéra Garnier is 600 metres away and an airport shuttle is available with an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Le Monna Lisa by Inwood Hotels
description: This Design hotel is located in Paris’s 8th district just 200 metres from the Champs Elysees. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at Hotel Monna Lisa Champs Elysées feature a contemporary design, Slovenian oak flooring and American walnut furniture. They are equipped with a telephone, flat-screen satellite TV and private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. All of the rooms are accessible by lift. Hotel Monna Lisa Champs Elysées serves buffet breakfast each morning. Monna Lisa is 230 metres from Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro (line 9) and 450 metres from Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro (lines 1 and 9). The Arc de Triomphe and The Tuileries Garden are within walking distance.

name: Le Méridien Etoile
description: Le Méridien Etoile welcomes you to the City of Lights with effortless elegance and an exceptional service. Our hotel's location facilitates discovery of Paris's luminous attractions; in addition to being across from the Palais des Congrès, we're a short walk from the Champs Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe. Equally suitable for corporate travelers, leisure guests and families, we bear the proud distinction of being the flagship Le Méridien hotel in Paris, France, with captivating modern design and boutique amenities. Artfully appointed accommodation includes modern technology, luxurious bath products and the Le Méridien Signature Bed. Start your day with a delicious meal and return in the evening to savor dinner in our restaurant. Visit the Jazz Club Etoile, where live music provides the backdrop for cocktails and conversation. Host a memorable event in one of our flexible spaces, which can accommodate groups of any size.Marriott

name: Hotel de Nell
description: Located a short walk from East Railway Station, Cecil Hotel Paris offers guests a convenient base while visiting Paris. It is moments from Folies Bergere, eateries and nightlife options. The hotel has 39 stylish rooms offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Cecil Hotel Paris houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. The hotel is within walking distance of Rue Montorgueil, Opera-Comique and Place des Victoires. It is within a 20-minute stroll of East Paris Metro and RER Station, which allows convenient access in and around Paris.HotelsCombined

name: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal
description: Set within an 18th-century building, the Grand Hotel is located in the heart of Paris, 200 metres from the Louvre museum and Tuileries Gardens. It features fine works of art, a spa by Holidermie, à la carte restaurant and 24-hour reception. The designer rooms at Grand Hotel Palais Royal include a minibar, free Wi-Fi, en suite facilities and a HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms have a balcony with views Paris' monuments. Grand Hôtel Du Palais Royal serves a daily American-style buffet breakfast, which can be taken in the guest room upon request. Guests can also enjoy fine dining in the restaurant or relax with a drink in the hotel's bar. The Palais Royal-Musée du Louvre Metro station (line 1) is only 150 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the Champs-Elysées, Place de la Concorde and Arc de Triomphe. Charles-de-Gaulle Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hotel Square Louvois
description: Hôtel Square Louvois is situated in the 2nd district of Paris. Garnier Opera is a 10-minute walk from the property and Louvre Museum is a 15-minute walk away. An indoor swimming pool with a hydromassage bench are at guests’ disposal upon reservation and without charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a minibar and a HD flat-screen TV. They all have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and a shower or a bath. Some rooms include a Bluetooth radio alarm and a sofa bed. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in your room. A sweet snack is also offered from 16:00 to 18:00 with cakes, pastries, teas and chocolate. Guests can also enjoy a 24-hour fitness room. Massage and beauty treatments can be arranged on site. The nearest metro station is Quatre-Septembre, a 3-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Paris-Orly Airport, 16 km from the Hôtel Square Louvois.

name: Hotel Jacques de Molay
description: This hotel is located in the Marais, 1 km from Place des Vosges and 1.8 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral. It offers free access to the fitness centre and the sauna. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Jacques De Molay are equipped with satellite TV, a telephone, and private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served daily at the hotel. Guests can relax with a drink in Hotel Jacques De Molay’s bar. Jacques De Molay Hotel is 450 metres from Arts et Métiers Metro (lines 3 and 11). The Pompidou Centre and Canal Saint-Martin are within walking distance.

name: La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Paris, La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free broadband WiFi and a garden. This property also provides guests with a terrace. All accommodation has free high-speed wifi access, a flat-screen TV, a safe, a coffee machine and kettle. The studios and apartments have a fully equipped kitchen with induction hob, microwave, fridge and dishwasher. La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris offers a fitness room, a furnished garden, a breakfast area, a bar and a restaurant. 24 hour reception and concierge services are offered. La Clef Champs-Elysées Paris by The Crest Collection is located on the edge of the Parisian Golden Triangle, this part of the 8th arrondissement surrounded by Montaigne avenues and Champs-Elysées. The Louis Vuitton store is 2-minutes and the Arc de Triomphe is 10 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Litteraire Le Swann, BW Premier Collection
description: The Hotel Litteraire Le Swann, BW Premier Collection has been fully refurbished in 2013 in a contemporary style in memory of Marcel Proust. The Hotel Litteraire Le Swann, BW Premier Collection is ideally located in the heart of the historic Luthier district, just minutes from the Gare Saint Lazare train station, the main department stores and the Garnier Opera house. You'll enjoy the hotel's magnificent 19th century architecture, which won an award in the 1898 World's Fair. Fully air-conditioned, our hotel boasts 81 rooms and a lovely lobby under an Art Deco glass ceiling. Quick, direct access to the La Defense business district, the western suburbs and many main tourist attractions including the Eiffel tower, Arc de Triomphe and Versailles. The Hotel Litteraire Le Swann, BW Premier Collection staff is on hand to make your stay as pleasant as possible and smooth your stopover at Paris.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Madison
description: Situated opposite Saint-Germain-des-Prés Church, Hotel Madison is located in the heart of Paris’ Latin Quarter. It offers modern accommodation and an elegantly decorated bar. The ensuite guestrooms at Hotel Madison are decorated in a contemporary style. Modern facilities include satellite TV, a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Every morning a continental breakfast is served in the authentic breakfast lounge. In the evenings, guests can relax with a drink at the stylish bar. Choose from a selection of wines, teas and fruit juices. Hotel Madison’s location makes it easy to access the principal tourist sights of Paris including the Louvre and Orsay museums and Notre Dame Cathedral.

name: Hotel Michelet Odeon
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Michelet Odeon is located in Paris, 1.1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available. Some of the rooms provide a desk. The rooms come with a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries are featured. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and airport shuttle is available at an extra cost. Louvre Museum is 1.4 km from Hotel Michelet Odeon, while Orsay Museum is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15.4 km from Hotel Michelet Odeon.

name: Grand Powers
description: Located in Paris' Golden Triangle, Grand Powers is a 5-star boutique hotel in the 8th arrondissement. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy the spa which has a Turkish bath, a sauna and a hot tub. Some rooms and suites at the Grand Powers are decorated with parquet and a chimney, and some offer a balcony and views of the Eiffel Tower. Each room has a Smart TV and a Nespresso coffee machine, and the bathrooms have Dyptique toiletries. The hotel serves an American buffet breakfast each morning. Guests can dine and enjoy a drink in the Café 52 restaurant and bar. The Clefs d’Or Concierge at the hotel can provide tips on the area. The Champs-Elysées is 250 metres from Grand Powers and Avenue Montaigne is 350 metres away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Maison Breguet
description: Maison Bréguet is a hotel with a restaurant and a bar in Paris, 500 metres from Place de la Bastille. Guests can enjoy massages and use the fitness centre in this 5-star hotel. All rooms have air-conditioning and soundproofing. The private bathrooms have either a bath or a shower and include free toiletries and slippers. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property and the restaurant specialises in French cuisine. Other facilities at Maison Bréguet include a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and a garden. A laundry service is available for a fee and there is also a business centre. Opéra Bastille is 650 metres from Maison Bréguet, while Place de la République is a 17-minute walk from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

name: French Theory
description: Inspiration comes in many forms. A tableside book, left by a thoughtful host. A fresh cityscape canvased on a windowframe. The new, the old, and the imaginary. Faraway flavours jamming with local sounds. French Theory thrives on inspiration in all its multifarious glory. A hotel, concept store and musical laboratory, French Theory contributes to the creative revival of the Parisian Left Bank. Set in the heart of the Latin Quarter, the hotel includes 48 thoughfully-designed rooms and suites. The ground floor provides culinary and cultural nourrishment via the café and the Botanical Room concept store. The cellar houses the beating heart of French Theory, the Audio Lab.Official Hotel Information

name: Hôtel le Derby Alma by Inwood Hotels
description: This 4-star hotel boasts a tremendous location, within a stone’s throw of the Champs-Élysées and the Eiffel Tower. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the property. Derby Alma features refined and cosy setting. The air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Everything has been designed with comfort in mind and will contribute to making an unforgettable stay, whether on a business or leisure trip. Buffet breakfast is served daily at the property and guests can also enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Derby Alma is a 8-minute walk from Alma - Marceau Metro Station, providing direct access to the city centre as well as the business district. The property is 1.8 km from the Arc de Triomphe.

name: Okko Hotels Paris Porte de Versailles
address: 2 rue du Colonel Pierre Avia, 75015 Paris
description: Okko Hotels Paris Porte De Versailles is located 700 metres from Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre and 2.8 km from Parc des Princes It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi throughout. The Eiffel Tower is 3.6 km far from the property. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will find a Nespresso machine as well as an iPod dock in the rooms. They have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Soft drinks are also included throughout the day free of charge in the lounge, and in the evening guests are offered an appetiser buffet with antipasti, fresh vegetables, dips and seasonal products. Guests have access to a shared club lounge with computers, a library and local wines and beers. There is a fitness centre and sauna at Okko Hotels Paris Porte de Versailles, and a gift shop selling local products. There is a 24-hour front desk. Orsay Museum is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Marquis Faubourg Saint Honoré - Relais & Châteaux
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Paris. It also provides valet parking, free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. Deluxe amenities at Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include a limousine service and a day spa. It also has babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. Rooms at Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include a complimentary fruit bowl and an iPod docking station. They each have a mini bar, converters/voltage adaptors and luxury linen. Places of interest close to Hotel Marquis Faubourg Saint-Honore include the Palais Garnier, Tuileries Garden and Champs-Elysees. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Saint-Lazare Train Station and Opera Metro Station, which allows easy access in and around Paris.Revato

name: Brach Paris
description: Brach Paris is set in the 16th arr. of Paris within easy reach of the Eiffel Tower and Trocadéro. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a fitness club with pools, sauna, hammam and massage rooms, as well as a barber shop. Guests can participate in group fitness classes free of charge and private coaching is available for a fee. The bright and spacious rooms and suites are fully equipped with high quality sound system and soundproofing. They feature tailor-made toiletries, high quality bedding, a dressing room and an elegant desk. Some rooms and suites offer a terrace and views over Paris and Haussmanian facades. Brach Paris offers breakfast each morning. The restaurant proposes healthy dishes inspired by Mediterranean cuisine à la carte 7 days a week, all day long. Guests can also taste some pastries created by Yann Brys, Meilleur Ouvrier de France (winner of a prestigious award in France) from the pastry shop and late-night cocktails. The reception is available 24/7 with a large terrace located on the first floor. Brach also offers private limousine services, valet parking and a concierge service who can arrange a variety of services throughout Paris. Other facilities include a business center and 24-hour room service. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 21 km from Brach Paris. Charles de Gaulle Airport is 30 km away.

name: Villa Margaux Opera Montmartre
description: Villa Margaux Opéra Montmartre is located halfway between Montmartre (Sacré-Cœur) and the Opera Garnier, and less than a 3-minute walk to 2 Metro stations, Saint Georges and Pigalle. All of the rooms in the Villa Margaux Opéra Montmartrel have a work area, Flat-screen TV with international channels. Each is air-conditioned and also features a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi internet access. Guests are invited to the dining room with vaulted ceiling and stonework for a buffet breakfast served from 07:30 am and 10:00. In summer time, take advantage of the cool temperatures of its interior courtyard. The Gare du Nord train station with its Eurostar terminal, and Gare Saint-Lazare are easily and quickly accessible from the Margaux Opéra Montmartre by public transport.

name: La Villa des Ternes
description: La Villa des Ternes is located in Paris, 900 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and Bois de Boulogne. It offers air-conditioned rooms with modern décor and free WiFi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A breakfast buffet is served daily, and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar. A 24-hour front desk with concierge service and laundry facilities is available. Villa Ternes is just a 5-minute walk from the Porte Maillot Metro and RER Station, which provides direct access to all of Paris’s famous sites, including Avenue des Champs-Elysées and La Défense business district. Paris Palais des Congrès is 450 metres away.

name: Hotel Brighton
description: This 19th-century building is situated in the heart of Paris, opposite the Louvre and the Tuileries Gardens. This hotel is furnished with antique furniture, chandeliers, and artworks. Each air-conditioned room at the Brighton combines historical charm with modern comfort. All the rooms have a typical Parisian decor, period furniture and paintings. With a Nespresso coffee machine, they feature views of the courtyard, the Eiffel Tower or the les Tuileries Gardens, satellite TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Hotel Brighton has a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. There is a lift, and Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel. Paris’s attractions are easily accessible on foot, but there is the Tuileries Metro Station just 50 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Bourgogne & Montana
description: Located on a quiet square opposite the National Assembly, this former 18th-century family mansion offers luxury rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi access. It is a 10-minute walk from Place de la Concorde and the Tuileries Gardens and a 20-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. A sauna is available and can be privatised for 45 minutes upon request. An LCD TV with satellite channels is offered in the rooms and suites at Hôtel Bourgogne & Montana. All accommodation features free bathrobes and slippers and some has period-style furniture. A buffet breakfast is served in the bright breakfast room, where guests can read a newspaper from the 24-hour reception. Montana’s bar also offers a range of vintage wines in the hotel’s lounges. Staff at Bourgogne & Montana can reserve tickets and advise guests on the capital’s attractions. Invalides RER Station is a 10-minute walk away and leads directly to the Eiffel Tower and Notre-Dame Cathedral. The Louvre Museum 15 minutes away via public transport.

name: Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel
description: Discover our hidden gem, the Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel, located in the very chic and peaceful 16th Arrondissement of Paris, just around the corner from the most notorious Parisian landmarks: the Eiffel Tower, the Arc-de-Triomphe and the Champs-Élysées. Once the Parisian fort of the brilliant Alfred Nobel, and home to his orchid greenhouse, the four remarkable buildings of our hotel, surrounding an enchanting garden, will take you on a travel back in time to the Paris of the 1870s. Whether you are visiting the City of Lights for work, leisure, or a romantic getaway, our impeccable service and unique events will make us your first choice for your Paris trip.Marriott

name: Hotel Claridge Paris
description: Hotel Claridge is located in Paris’s 8th district, just 300 metres from the famous Champs-Élysées. It provides 4-star accommodation and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Claridge rooms are decorated with period furniture, traditional woodwork, and bedspreads and fabric wall covering that match the curtains. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony. Claridge Paris has implemented a number of measures to reduce its impact on the environment including use of low-energy light bulbs, bathroom amenities in recyclable packaging and water flow reducers. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast in the breakfast room and a continental breakfast can be delivered to your room at an extra cost. Claridge’s bar serves a variety of drinks and snack room service is also available. Guests have access to many restaurants near the hotel. Hotel Claridge Paris is a 5-minute walk from the Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro (lines 1 and 9) and the Seine River.

name: Hotel Yllen Eiffel
description: Located a 25-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower, Yllen Eiffel is in the heart of Paris’ 15th arrondissement. It is in front of Volontaires Metro Station providing direct access to Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. Rooms at Yllen Eiffel are air-conditioned and feature an LCD TV and a minibar. Each has tea and coffee making facilities, as well as free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. Additional facilities include a 24-hour desk with luggage storage and a dry cleaning service. With local transport links just outside the hotel, sights such as the Sacré Coeur, the Champs de Mars and Place de la Concorde can easily be reached. The péripherique is 8 minutes away and parking is possible nearby.

name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Located in the 16th district of Paris, La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection is just 900 metres from the Eiffel Tower and 4.4 km from Parc des Princes Stadium. Set in 2 uniquely decorated buildings the property features a landscaped garden and a fitness room. The contemporary-style rooms are equipped with a minibar and a TV with cable channels. Each room has a private bathroom decorated with white marble furnishings and is equipped with complimentary toiletries and slippers. Free WiFi is available throughout the residence. A continental breakfast is served in the breakfast room or guests can order breakfast in their rooms. Free hot drinks, juice and pastries are served every day from 15:00 until 17:00. Additional facilities include a laundry and dry cleaning service. A business centre and meeting/banqueting facilities are also available for guests' convenience. With private parking on site, the hotel is only 300 metres from Trocadéro Metro Station, providing access to the Champs Elysées.

name: Hotel Raphael
description: Situated a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Paris. It offers a panoramic terrace and a gastronomic restaurant. Decorated in a Louis 15th and 16th style, guest rooms feature wooden furnishings and elaborate wall hangings. They include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some of the suites feature a balcony, views of the Eiffel Tower and lounge area. Chef proposes gourmet French cuisine at the sophisticated Raphael Restaurant. Guests can relax and have a snack, tea, drink or just relax in the English Bar's red velvet armchairs. During the summer season, guests can quench your thirst or sit down for a summertime meal on the splendid rooftop located on the 7th floor. Like is a true hanging garden, the rooftop offers a panoramic 360° view over Paris where guests can take in the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, the Sacré Cœur. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access, hammam, a sauna and a fitness room. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is just 400 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais. Trocadero is a 15-minute walk away, which offers one of the best views of the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

name: Hotel Sleeping Belle
description: Hotel Sleeping Belle sits just 700 metres from the Place de la Bastille in the east of Paris and a 3-minute walk to the Gare de Lyon Train Station. Its en suite rooms have free WiFi. The modern rooms feature red and white décor. They all have a flat-screen TV and air-conditioning. A buffet breakfast is available daily from 05:00 to 11:00 and can be served to your guest room at an additional charge. Notre Dame Cathedral is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The Metro Line 1 is 700 metres away and offers direct access to the Louvre Museum, the Champs-Elysées and the La Défense business district.

name: Le Marquis Eiffel
description: Just a 5-minute walk to the Eiffel Tower, this boutique hotel offers elegant rooms and is a 10-minute walk from the Trocadero Gardens. Guest rooms at Le Marquis Eiffel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Room service is available. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the bathrooms, while some rooms also provide bathrobes. In the morning, guests can choose from a buffet or a continental breakfast served on the outdoor terrace. Hotel Le Marquis Eiffel also features a lounge bar and a library. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. Reception is open 24 hours at Le Marquis Eiffel, and there is a concierge service that can make reservations for restaurants and theatre shows upon request. The nearest Metro stop is Dupleix which provides direct access to the Arc de Triomphe, Effel Tower and Trocadero.

name: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe
description: Our 5-star luxury hotel is a true haven of peace being in a very calm street, and yet close to the bustling Champs Elysées, the main fashion avenues and great museums. With its Haussmann façade and contemporary interior design, it will seduce you for business trips and family weekends. The Parisian rooms and suites, Les Cocottes restaurant and its terrace with Chef Christian Constant will make your stay unforgettable.accorhotels.com

name: Le General Hotel
description: Situated in Paris’ 11th district, General Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Republique Square and has a fitness centre with sauna. Accommodations feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Général Hôtel have an iPod docking station. L'Occitane amenities are included in each private bathroom, which is equipped with a hairdryer and bathtub or shower. Sweet and savoury breakfast items can be served directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and enjoy the selection of international newspapers. The Hotel General is 350 metres from Republique Metro Station, which offers connections to 4 metro lines. Shopping and cafés in the popular Marais district are 500 metres away. The Georges Pompidou Centre is a 30-minute walk from the hotel.

name: 9Confidentiel
address: 58 Rue du Roi de Sicile, 75004 Paris
description: Ideally set in the centre of Paris, 9Confidentiel features continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is situated less than 1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. Guest rooms have a wardrobe. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Pompidou Centre, Sainte-Chapelle and Opéra Bastille. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from 9Confidentiel.

name: Kopster Hotel Paris Porte de Versailles
description: KOPSTER, the Lifestyle signature of Lavorel Hotels. The Kopster Hotel Paris Porte de Versailles, a lifestyleestablishment, welcomes you in an original and warm setting where life is good. Whether you are in Paris for a professional event or with your family, enjoy a moment of relaxation in a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. The Kopster Hotel is above all a place that looks like you, far from the codes and standards.The hotel has 127 modern and comfortable rooms with a cool and unique spirit. Our Authentik and Unik rooms are the perfect placeto stay for singles or couples. The Suites K have a living room and can accommodate up to 4 people. All our rooms are equipped with all the necessary amenities for optimal comfort, a modern bathroom and numerous conveniences such as unlimited highspeed WiFi and a courtesy tray.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Bridget
description: Situated in Paris, 4 km from Gare du Nord, Hotel Bridget features views of the city. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.9 km from Opéra Bastille. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. All guest rooms in Hotel Bridget are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Languages spoken at the reception include English and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Gare de l'Est is 4.1 km from Hotel Bridget, while Pompidou Centre is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Aston
description: Located in Paris’s Grands Boulevards area, 1 km from Opéra Garnier, this boutique hotel is located in a traditional Haussmanian building and offers air-conditioned guestrooms with free Wi-Fi. Guest rooms at Hotel Aston are bright with a modern décor. They each have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms have a small balcony. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s breakfast room with an arched stone ceiling. Breakfast can also be served in guests’ rooms upon request. The reception desk at Hotel Aston is open 24 hours a day and offers a ticket reservation service for shows and excursions. Grands Boulevards Metro Station is located 270 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to The Eiffel Tower. Galeries Lafayette department store is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain
description: Located in a lively district in central Paris, this 4-star hotel, decorated by Jacques Garcia, is set in a 16th-century building with an interior courtyard. The property is fully air-conditioned both in the rooms and in the reception area. Its guestrooms feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and feature a dressing room. All rooms at hotel Odeon Saint Germain are decorated with silk curtains. Each room includes welcome gifts by L’Occitane. A breakfast buffet is served every morning at the Odeon Saint Germain. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar featuring original stonework. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel provides an airport shuttle and a ticket service. Notre Dame Cathedral is a 12-minute walk from the hotel. Odeon Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Montmartre district.

name: Bonsoir Madame
description: Bonsoir Madame is located in one of the prestigious left bank’s quiet streets, close to the Luxembourg Gardens. It is a 5-minute walk from Rennes Metro Station and offers a lounge with a library and fireplace where guests can enjoy a drink. Each room at Bonsoir Madame is individually decorated and features a flat-screen smart TV, a safe and a minibar. A bottle of water and free WiFi access are offered in all rooms. A buffet breakfast featuring fresh and organic ingredients is available every morning and can be enjoyed in the privacy of the guest rooms. Additional hotel facilities include a 24-hour reception, a concierge service and luggage storage. Luxembourg RER station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and provides access to Charles de Gaulle Airport. Other local transport links lead to attractions such as Montmartre and Place de la Concorde.

name: Hotel Crayon by Elegancia
description: Located in the heart of the historical center of Paris, between culture, in-fashion places and public gardens ï¿½ Beaubourg Center, the Louvre, the Opera, the Place des Victoires, the Forum des Halles and the gardens of the Royal Palace ï¿½ an address to remember.WIHP

name: Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne
description: A 5-minute walk from The Louvre, this refined hotel offers air-conditioned rooms in the very centre of Paris. Notre Dame Cathedral is 1 km away. The elegant guestrooms at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne have a Louis Philippe style décor with wooden furniture and luxurious fabrics. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a work area with a desk. All rooms are serviced by an elevator. Some rooms are accessible for guests with reduced mobility. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s renovated cellar or in guests’ rooms upon request. A room service offering drinks and snacks is also available. The reception area at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne is open 24 hours a day and offers a concierge service. Free newspapers are available each day in the lobby area. Louvre-Rivoli Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel and offers direct access to the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe.

name: Hotel De La Porte Doree
description: Hotel De La Porte Doree is located in Paris, 210 metres from Bois de Vincennes and a 20-minute walk from AccorHotels Arena. It offers classic rooms with parquet flooring and antique furniture. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player. Tea and coffee making facilities are also provided. The private bathroom is fitted with a hairdryer and luxury products. All rooms are accessible by a lift. The Porte Doree offers a buffet breakfast, with homemade jams. Guests can relax in the hotel’s lounge with the daily newspapers. The hotel’s front desk is opened 24/7. La Porte Doree has a green policy, using energy saving equipment and recycling programs. Porte Dorée Metro station is 20 metres away, which gives direct to Bastille, Opera and the Eiffel Tower.

name: La Villa Maillot
description: La Villa Maillot is a renovated, 18th-century villa, combining a classic décor and modern design. Located in Paris, it offers a wellness centre, a bar lounge and an indoor, Japanese garden. Porte Maillot Metro Station is 200 metres away. All of the rooms at La Villa Maillot have a unique, colourful décor. Each soundproofed room has a seating area, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Each room also includes an en suite bathroom with a shower. Every morning you can choose between a continental and a full English breakfast. After breakfast, you can relax with a drink from the bar, by the fireplace. The wellness centre features a sauna, a hammam and a massage room. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The Arc de Triomphe is 800 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Artus
description: Hôtel Artus is in the heart of Saint Germain des Près on Paris’ chic left bank. It is a boutique hotel offering a sauna and luxury rooms and suites, 1-minute walk from Mabillon Metro Station. Guests can use the sauna. Decorated in soft pastels and bright printed fabrics, accommodation at Artus features an iPod docking station and an LCD TV. The private bathrooms have the added comfort of bathrobes and slippers. Located in the cellar, the modern breakfast room offers a hot and cold buffet every morning. Additional facilities include free Wi-Fi and massages can be booked at the 24-hour reception. Local transport links conveniently lead directly to sights such as Jardin des Plantes and Ile-de-la-Cité. The Seine is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Cluny’s Medieval Museum is just 700 metres away.

name: Hotel Eiffel Seine
description: This Art Nouveau styled hotel is located beside the River Seine, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. Bir-Hakeim Metro Station is directly opposite the hotel and offers easy access to all of Paris’s famous sights, such as the Arc de Triomphe. The air-conditioned rooms are contemporary in style and offer free WiFi. They feature double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Hotel Eiffel Seine also has a bar with a lounge area. A buffet breakfast is either served in the hotel dining room, on the terrace or in guests’ rooms. There is a 24-hour front desk with laundry facilities at the property. All rooms at the Hotel Eiffel Seine are serviced by a lift. The Hotel Eiffel Seine is 800 metres from Jardins du Trocadero and 1.1 km from Musée du quai Branly.

name: 9Hotel Bastille - Lyon
description: 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon is a 5-minute walk from Gare de Lyon and 600 metres from the lively Bastille district. It offers free Wi-Fi access and rooms with satellite TV. Rooms at 9Hotel Bastille-Lyon are decorated in creams and yellows and offer a work desk and a private safe. Each is air-conditioned and also features a private bathroom. Buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s breakfast room. Additional facilities include a cold drinks vending machine and luggage storage in the 24-hour reception. Gare de Lyon Metro Station provides direct access to Paris’ sights such as Le Louvre, Avenue Champs Elysées the Marais district. Guests can also walk to Bercy in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Bloum
description: Villa La Parisienne is a popular choice amongst travelers in Paris, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, mirror, closet can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Paris, Villa La Parisienne will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Pavillon Opera Grands Boulevards
description: Located a 10 minute walk from Galeries Lafayette and Opéra Garnier, this boutique hotel offers heated rooms with a minibar. The Montmartre district is a 20-minute walk away. Guest rooms at Pavillon Opéra Grands Boulevards feature satellite TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a modern en suite bathroom and is serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in Pavillon Opéra’s breakfast room or in guests’ rooms upon request. In the evening, guests are invited to relax in the hotel’s bar with a drink. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby area of the hotel that is decorated. The reception desk is open 24 hours a day and offers a reservation service for excursions. Metro Stations Grands Boulevards is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to Bastille and The Marais.

name: Hotel le Saint Gregoire
description: This 18th-century building is located in central Paris, just a 20-minute walk from the River Seine and the Louvre. It offers stylish and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. Each guest room at Le Saint Gregoire is soundproofed and has a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a private terrace. Guests can enjoy an evening drink in the hotel bar and a continental breakfast is served every morning. The hotel reception is open 24 hours a day and Wi-Fi access is available. Le Saint Gregoire is just a few steps from the Saint Placide Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from Montparnasse. The Jardin du Luxembourg is just 500 metres away.

name: Hôtel de La Boétie
description: Hotel de la Boétie is located just 300 metres from the famous Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers a 24-hour reception and a modern bar with armchairs and sofas. Rooms at Hotel de la Boétie are individually decorated and offer a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms are interconnecting and all have access to the Wi-Fi connection. An American breakfast is served in the breakfast room every day. Additional facilities include a meeting room and luggage storage in the reception. The hotel is 160 metres from Saint-Philippe-du-Roule Metro Station and 700 metres from George V. They both lead directly to sights such as Le Marais, Le Louvre and Galleries Lafayette department store.

name: Passy Eiffel
description: Passy Eiffel is just 700 metres from Trocadéro, which offers the best views of the Eiffel Tower. It offers 3-star accommodation in one of Paris’ calm and safe streets. Rooms at Passy Eiffel are contemporary in style and offer a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. All are air-conditioned and some have views of the Eiffel Tower. The hotel serves a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Additional facilities include a shuttle service to the airport and major train stations with extra fee. Passy Metro Station is just 250 metres from the hotel and provides direct access to the capital’s sights. The Arc de Triomphe, the Champs Elysées and Montparnasse can be accessed directly.

name: Hotel Prince Albert Concordia
description: This hotel is located in the centre of Paris, less than a 15-minute walk from the River Seine, Jardin des Plantes, Bastille and AccorHotels Arena. It offers free Wi-Fi access. Each air-conditioned room at the Hôtel Prince Albert Concordia is equipped with satellite channels on a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Hôtel Prince Albert offers a 24-hour front desk service and an elevator that can take guests to their rooms. A vending machine with fresh beverage is also available. Guest can explore Paris and its sought-after sights by foot or by transport, such as Metro and RER station Gare de Lyon, which is 350 metres from the hotel. A shuttle bus can take guests to Charles de Gaulle Airport upon request.

name: Grand Hotel Dechampaigne
description: The Grand Hotel Dechampaigne is just a 5-minute walk from Le Louvre and the Notre Dame, in central Paris. It offers rooms with Louis XIII-period décor and furniture. Each room at the Dechampaigne is equipped with free Wi-Fi access, a private bathroom with a bathtub or shower and satellite TV. Breakfast is served in the rooms each morning and guests can enjoy gluten-free produce for breakfast upon request. Guests of the Grand Hotel can enjoy a drink in the bar, which features original 16th century furnishings. The hotel also has a souvenir shop and provides a 24-hour reception. Between Rivoli Street and the River Seine, the Dechampaigne Grand Hotel is situated less than 100 metres from Chatelet Metro Station, which provides direct access to Orly Airport and Charles de Gaulle Airport.

name: Holiday Inn Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille
description: Holiday Inn® Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille offers contemporary rooms and suites with ideal for business and leisure travel. Housed in a belle époque building, our central Paris hotel is a five-minute walk from the renowned Gare de Lyon, a major hub for metro and RER trains. Start the day with our breakfast buffet and meet for evening drinks in our buzzy bar and restaurant. Plan a meeting or event in one of our seven venues, including the skylit Opera Room. Walk to iconic Paris attractions such as the grand Opera de Bastille and the Accor Arena. Stroll along the River Seine to the Notre Dame cathedral or take a short train ride to La Défense business district Traveling with family? Kids stay free and we’re only a 35-minute train ride to Disneyland.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Bastille Speria
description: The Speria Hotel is located in the trendy Marais district, between Bastille and the Vosges Squares. It offers 24-hour reception and modern style accommodations with air conditioning and satellite TV. The Bastille Speria provides rooms with en suite facilities, featuring a bathtub and a hairdryer. They have a working area with a desk and a telephone. All rooms are accessible by lift and dry cleaning service is available. A buffet breakfast is at your disposal every morning and can be served in the comfort of your room. You can also relax in the 2 lounge living-room, and enjoy daily newspapers. The multilingual staff welcome you 24/7 and Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Bastille Spéria hotel. Place de la Bastille and its famous opera house are just 350 metres from the hotel. You can also walk to the town hall and the Georges Pompidou centre in 20 minutes. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Whistler
description: Hotel Whistler is located in the 10th arrondissement of Paris, 1.2 km from La Cigale Concert Hall and in between Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est train stations. Hotel Whistler features free WiFi throughout the property. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some private bathrooms are fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning for an extra fee. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. For a supplement and subject to availability, guests can privatise the hammam between 08:00 and 20:00. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Whistler, while Place de la République is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Opéra Richepanse
address: 14, Rue Du Chevalier De Saint George, 75001 Paris
description: Hotel Opéra Richepanse is a boutique hotel in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Place de la Concorde and the Champs Elysées. The luxury shops on rue Saint-Honoré are 50 metres away. The large, modern rooms each have a flat-screen TV, lighting control system device, music in the private bathroom and a bath or a walk-in shower. Each one also includes air-conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee, while some also offer views of Madeleine Church. Free WiFi access is available. The hotel provides a full buffet breakfast every morning, served either in the 17th-century dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Daily newspapers are provided. The reception features a marble floor and is open 24 hours. The multilingual staff will be happy to help you organise your stay in Paris. It is 50 metres from Madeleine Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from the Tuileries Gardens, Opéra Garnier and Place de la Vendome. You may also choose to visit the Louvre Museum, which is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Sonder Quintinie
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hôtel Résidence Quintinie Square offers self-catering accommodation in Paris. Paris Expo - Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km from the property and the Pasteur Institute is a 5-minute walk away. Each of the tastefully decorated studios is fitted with wooden floors, large windows and comfortable bedding. A kitchenette, equipped with a microwave and refrigerator is at your disposal. A stovetop is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Bed linen is available. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from Hôtel Résidence Quintinie Square, while Orsay Museum is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 13 km from the property. The hotel also provides free parking for bikes in the courtyard, subject to availability.

name: Hotel at Gare du Nord
description: This hotel is located in central Paris, next to Gare du Nord. The hotel has a 24 hour reception and guestrooms with lift access, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Hotel de l'Aqueduc offers a buffet breakfast and the reception provides daily newspapers. The Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are situated next to the hotel. They offer metro, rail and Eurostar links throughout Paris and beyond. The Canal Saint-Martin is just 400 metres from the Hotel de l'Aqueduc and Montmartre is 1 km away. Guests can take the RER direct to Parc des Expositions de Villepinte in 30 minutes.

name: Le Tourville Eiffel
description: Le Tourville Eiffel offers charming accommodation with a neo-classic décor, just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. The hotel’s bar is a good place to relax after a long day of work or sightseeing. Guest rooms are air-conditioned, individually decorated and feature a flat-screen satellite TV with international channels. Some have a private terrace and the suites have a spa bath. All rooms provide bathrobes and slippers. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge and there is also the option to have a take-away breakfast. You can access sights such as Place de la Concorde directly from Ecole Militaire Metro Station (Line 8), 250 metres away.

name: Hotel Alize Grenelle
description: Located in central Paris, this hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It features a 24-hour reception and offers modern rooms with a TV and Wi-Fi access. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 2-minute walk away. Guest rooms are equipped with a trouser press and an alarm clock. Each room have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift at hotel Alizé Grenelle. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Breakfast can be served to your room upon request. Alizé Grenelle Tour Eiffel is just 50 metres from Charles Michels Metro Station, providing access to the Latin Quarter. Private parking is available 50 metres from the hotel with an additional cost and upon prior reservation.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description: Boasting a bar and a spa and wellness centre, Maison ELLE Paris is set in Paris, 600 metres from Arc de Triomphe and 1.4 km from Palais des Congrès de Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Maison ELLE Paris all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 23 km from Maison ELLE Paris.

name: Hôtel Orphée - Orso hotel
description: This 3-star hotel is located 800 metres from the Museum of Natural History and the Jardin des Plantes. It offers free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception, just 50 metres from Saint-Marcel Metro Station. The guest rooms at Hotel Orphée - Orso Hotels have an LCD TV with satellite channels. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have a private balcony. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room every morning. There is also the option to take a continental breakfast in the comfort of your room. The River Seine is 600 metres from the hotel and Austerlitz Train Station is 400 metres away. You can also use local transport to access the Lively Place de la République or the Sorbonne directly.

name: Hotel Sookie
description: Attractively located in Paris, HOTEL SOOKIE features a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Pompidou Centre. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at HOTEL SOOKIE have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms have a seating area. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gare de l'Est, Opéra Bastille and Notre Dame Cathedral. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 17 km from HOTEL SOOKIE.

name: Crystal Hotel
description: Crystal Hotel is located in the heart of Saint-Germain, just around the corner from the famous Café des Deux Magots. It offers colourful rooms equipped with a minibar and a safe. The non-smoking rooms at Crystal Hotel are air-conditioned and feature a TV with satellite channels. Each also has free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom with amenities and a bath. Breakfast is served in the vaulted cellar or in the comfort of guest rooms. Additional hotel facilities include a 24-hour reception where guests can relax in the armchairs and admire the large mural. The Medieval Museum can be reached in a 10-minute walk and Jardin du Luxembourg is just 650 metres away. Saint-Germain-des-Près Metro Station provides direct access to Notre Dame Cathedral.

name: Hotel de L'Esperance
description: Located a 2-minute walk from the lively rue Mouffetard in Paris, Hotel de L'Esperance offers an inner courtyard. Place Monge and the Latin district are a 10-minute's walk away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. Every air conditioned room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and comes with a private bathroom with bath or shower. There is a 24-hour front desk, a luggage room and concierge service at Hotel de L'Esperance. Vending machines for snacks and drinks are also featured. The hotel also offers car hire. Censier Daubenton Metro Station is 350 metres from the property, providing access to central Paris within 20 minutes by public transport. The lively Buttes aux Cailles neighborhood is 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Louison
description: Hotel Louison is located in central Paris, 500 metres from the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro (lines 4, 6, 12 and 13). Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Eco-label certified, the hotel has soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms with lift access and satellite TV. Among our eco-responsible commitments, we chose to offer a homemade breakfast buffet with local and seasonal products. Every evening, a homemade aperitif with a selection of drinks and appetizers is available free of charge in the dining room. The hotel is 800 metres from the Bon Marche and 1.3 km from Saint-Germain-des-Prés. From the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro, guests can quickly access the rest of central Paris.

name: Residhome Paris Rosa Parks
description: Located in Paris, Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is an easy drive from the Musee du Louvre and Seine. Those staying at the property can also take advantage of free Wi-Fi during their stay. Apartments are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as slippers, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. For guests who wish to cook their own meals, there is a kitchenette that is conveniently equipped with kitchenware, a dishwasher and a refrigerator. Those staying at the property can enjoy a varied breakfast, which is available each morning. Residhome Paris Rosa Parks is within walking distance of Parc de la Villette and Place de l Argonne. Eiffel Tower is just a short car ride from the property.Revato

name: Mercure Paris Place D'italie
description: Located in the heart of a quintessential Parisian suburb in the 13th arrondissement, Mercure Paris Place d'Italie immerses you in a world of haute couture with its fashion-inspired decor and display of designer gowns. In this completely renovated hotel are a meeting room and elegant guest accommodation, including four family rooms and Privilege rooms with views of the Eiffel Tower. Each morning, we are pleased to serve a delicious breakfast featuring regional fare from a small market nearby.accorhotels.com

name: Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon
description: Located in Paris and within 1.8 km of Opéra Bastille, Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.2 km from Paris-Gare-de-Lyon, 3.6 km from Notre Dame Cathedral and 3.7 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel has family rooms. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a seating area. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Sainte-Chapelle is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Luxembourg Gardens is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Appart'City Collection Paris Gare de Lyon.

name: Hotel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber
description: Set in a quiet and privileged district, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber is walking distance from the Champs Elysées and Trocadero Square, and a 3-minute walk from Victor Hugo metro station. Boissière metro station on line 6 is a 5-minute walk away. In a Parisian building, Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber offers air-conditioned rooms equipped with a desk, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms comes with a bathroom fitted with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. You can glance through the novels of Victor Hugo in the library and enjoy breakfast in the inner garden at an extra charge. There is a 24-hour front desk as well as facilities for disabled guests available at this property. The Eiffel Tower is 20 minutes away by public transport, while Palais des Congrès Convention Center is 15 minutes away from Hôtel Victor Hugo Paris Kléber.

name: Hotel Terre Neuve
address: 22 B Rue de Terre Neuve, 75020 Paris
description: Hotel Terre Neuve offers accommodation in Paris, 1.2 km from Père Lachaise Cemetery and 2.8 km from Bastille. Free WiFi access is provided. All rooms features tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. They have a private bathroom fitted with a walk-shower and a hairdryer. A continental buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Jardin des Plantes is 3.8 km from Hotel Terre Neuve, while Place de la République is 2.9 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 14 km away.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: This classical style, 4-star hotel is located in the Saint Germain area of Paris. Hôtel De Buci offers luxuriously decorated rooms with antique furnishings in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The soundproofed guest rooms at Hôtel De Buci have a typical Parisian charm with their velvet curtains and antique wooden furniture. Each room features Cable TV and a minibar. The Hôtel De Buci serves a buffet breakfast daily in the elegant breakfast room, and the hotel also features a 24-hour bar. Guests can visit the most famous sights of Paris easily, such as the Louvre and the Luxembourg Gardens, both of which are less than 10 minutes by foot from the hotel. There is also a concierge service for guests needing travel information.

name: Au Manoir Saint Germain
description: The Manoir Saint Germain is located next to the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Metro Station. This 4-star hotel overlooks the Deux Magots café and offers soundproofed accommodation with free internet access. Each guest room at the Manoir Saint Germain has a traditional décor with woodwork beds. They are also equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Some rooms have a view of the Saint-Germain-des-Prés Church and the Deux Magots café. A breakfast buffet is served daily and guests can relax in the bar or on the patio. The hotel also provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk. Au Manoir Saint Germain is just a 15-minute walk from the Musée d’Orsay and Le Louvre. The hotel is a short Metro ride from the Champs Elysées and the Eiffel Tower. Luxembourg Gardens are 750 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Belloy Saint-Germain
description: Hôtel Belloy Saint Germain is located in the historic Saint Germain district, near the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre Dame Cathedral. It offers modern air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms are accessible by a lift. The restaurant provides a buffet breakfast served in the classy dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink from the hotel’s honesty bar. This hotel’s central location allows guests to explore the nearby areas such as the lively Saint-Michel and Odeon. Metro Cluny – La Sorbonne is 270 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to famous sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Jardin des Plantes.

name: Hôtel Du Bois Champs-Elysées
description: The 3-star Hotel du Bois offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Paris. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, taxi service. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, closet, separate living room, internet access wireless. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Paris has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hotel du Bois.priceline.com

name: Hotel Le Chat Noir
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le Chat Noir offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to the Moulin Rouge. It is moments from Pigalle, eateries and nightlife options. The hotel has 39 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Guests are able to enjoy a book in the on-site library. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, an alarm clock and cable/satellite channels. Paris's attractions, such as Montmartre Cemetery and Place de Clichy, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Le Chat Noir. Guests can also visit Montmartre and the Musee de Montmarte.Revato

name: Hotel Tilsitt Etoile
description: The hotel is situated in quiet and typically paved Parisian street 350 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and a 5-minute walk from Avenue Champs Elysées. It offers rooms under the mansard on the sixth floor that overlook the rooftops of Paris. All of the rooms offer free high-speed WiFi internet access. At the Tilsitt Etoile,breakfast is served in the winter garden which features a patio and a fountain. Gluten free breakfast is available upon request. Guests can enjoy coffee facilities at the bar from 11:00. Place de l'Etoile is just 200 metres away leading to Place de la Concorde and Musée du Louvre. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Eiffel Capitol
description: Located on a quiet street on the left bank, this hotel is just a 10-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers modern guest rooms with free WiFi access and satellite TV. Each guest room also includes tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. Breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room, and can be taken in the guest room. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar at Eiffel Capitol hotel. Dupleix Metro Station is 150 metres away, providing access to the Arc de Triomphe. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 15 minutes away.

name: Hôtel Les Jardins de La Villa
description: Set in a period building, Les Jardins De La Villa hotel offers guest rooms overlooking the landscaped courtyard. With a 24-hour reception, it features a fitness room, a sauna and a hammam. The soundproofed rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and free WiFi access.
