Some rooms feature a seating area. Some rooms open onto flowery balcony at Jardins De La Villa. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room with a retractable roof. Guests can enjoy drinks from the bar. This 4-star hotel is located just 400 metres from the Palais des Congrès and the Arc de Triomphe is 1.2 km away. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel Louvre Piemont
description: Located in the historical district of the right bank, this hotel is set opposite Palais Royal Garden. It offers modern guest rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Each air-conditioned guest room is equipped with a minibar. The guest rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Louvre Piemont. Guests can enjoy breakfast while reading the newspapers provided. Palais Royal-Musée du Louvre Metro Station is just 260 metres from this hotel. Opéra Garnier is a 10-minute walk away.

name: ibis Paris Levallois-Perret
description: Located in the heart of Levallois, just a stone's throw from the Louise Michel metro station, the ibis Levallois Perret hotel is perfectly located for getting to St Lazare, Porte Maillot, La Défense and the Espace Champerret. The ibis Levallois Perret hot el has 53 completely renovated rooms, equipped with the new Sweet Bed by ibis bedding, air-conditioning and free WIFI. The hotel also has a bar with a terrace and a 24-hour snack service. Paying public car park close to the hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Magda Champs Elysées
description: The Arc de Triomphe is just 190 metres from this 3-star hotel. It features a bar and offers modern guest rooms with free internet access. Palais des Congrès Convention Centre is reachable within 7 minutes from Magda Champs Elysées using public transport. All of the elegant guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms feature a seating area and overlook the courtyard at Magda Champs Elysées. The rooms also include the use of a personal smartphone, offering unlimited calls to over 100 countries. It also has a WiFi terminal, free video streaming services and many other free apps. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served every morning and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar in hotel Magda Champs Elysées. With public parking available nearby, the hotel is a 6-minute walk from the famous Champs Elysées. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is 190 metres away and provides direct access to the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre Museum and La Défense business area.

name: Cour des Vosges
description: The stones of the ancient kings of France have countless stories to tell. Today, they invite you to write your own. At the legendary royal square of the Place des Vosges, EVOK welcomes you into the family residence of a noble lineage of erudite scholars, collectors of art and precious moments. A birds-eye view over Square Louis XIII,surrounded by the pink brick pavilions crowned with slate roofs. The majestic arcades proudly aligned to greet the newcomers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hotel Monte Cristo
description: Featuring a bar, Hôtel Montecristo is set in Paris, 1.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. The property is around 2.5 km from Opéra Bastille and 2.8 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. All guest rooms at Hôtel Montecristo include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and an indoor pool. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Hôtel Montecristo. Louvre Museum is 3 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hôtel Beauregard
description: Located next to Vaugirard Metro station, Hotel Hôtel Beauregard is a 2.2 km from the Eiffel Tower. It offers rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room at the Hôtel Beauregard has a contemporary decor and an en suite bathroom. Some also have a private balcony, with a view of the Eiffel Tower. A full buffet breakfast is served daily. Hotel Hôtel Beauregard is 1.6 km from the Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. It is a short Metro ride from the Champs-Elysees and the Montmartre district.

name: The Remix Hotel
description: Refurbished by the well-known designer Saar Zafrir, The ReMIX Hotel offers a bar, co-working space, 10 meeting rooms and a gym in the trendy La Villette district in Paris. The modern guest rooms are decorated with a blend of Parisian glamour and 80s rock and feature headboards with integrated USB ports, high speed WiFi and a flat-screen TV with Chromecast. The marble bathrooms have a shower or a bathtub. A buffet breakfast is available from 06:30 to 10:00, and guests can enjoy a coffee in the co-working space. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The Zénith and Philharmonie de Paris concert venues are within a 10-minute walk of The ReMIX Hotel. The hotel is served by metro lines 7, 5 and 3b, as well as the RER E, and areas such as the Opéra district can be reached within 15 minutes. The hotel can also be reached via bike along the Ourcq Canal and there is a public bike station nearby.

name: Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa
description: Well set in the centre of Paris, Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa offers 4-star accommodation close to Orsay Museum and Musée de l'Orangerie. Featuring a spa and wellness centre, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Louvre Museum, 1.7 km from Rodin Museum and 1.8 km from Luxembourg Gardens. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Guests at Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sainte-Chapelle, Tuileries Garden and Opéra Garnier. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 16 km from Hôtel Vinci Due & Spa.

name: Hotel Riesner
description: Set in central Paris, this hotel is 350 metres from Gare de Lyon RER Station. It features a 24-hour reception with a ticket service and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi access and tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. Vending machines selling drinks and snacks are also available. The Hôtel Riesner hotel is just 400 metres from Saint-Martin Canal and the Jardin des Plantes is a 10-minute walk away. The Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris are both accessible via Gare de Lyon.

name: Hotel Des Nations Saint Germain
description: Hôtel des Nations Saint Germain is in the heart of the Latin Quarter, 15 minutes from Notre Dame and a few steps from the famous Rue Mouffetard. It offers en suite rooms with a TV and free Wi-Fi. Air conditioning, a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities feature in all the rooms at Hotel des Nations. Each has free toiletries in the private bathroom. The hotel serves a full-English breakfast every morning in the breakfast room. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception with luggage storage and a laundry service. Located on one of the oldest streets in Paris, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from Jardin des Plantes. Place Monge Metro station is 2 minutes away providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and Opéra Garnier.

name: Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle
description: Situated in Paris and with Rodin Museum reachable within 2.4 km, Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Eiffel Tower is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Orsay Museum is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 15 km from Villa Eiffel Mademoiselle.

name: Hôtel Beige
description: The Hôtel Beige is located in the heart of Paris between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre. Its rooms offer views over the rooftops of Paris. All of the en suite rooms at Hôtel Beige+ are soundproofed and have flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Coffee, tea and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel’s ground-floor lounge, where a daily breakfast buffet is also served. During their stay, guests can rent a portable WiFi key from the reception, available for a fee. Hôtel Beige is serviced by a lift and offers 24-hour front desk service and free luggage storage.

name: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile
description: Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile, formerly the Hotel Concorde La Fayette, is 1.5 km from both the Arc de Triomphe and the famous Champs Elysées. The guest rooms each include a desk, cable TV, air conditioning and a safe. All rooms at the Hyatt Regency Paris Etoile offers views over Paris. Deluxe bath products are provided in the private bathrooms. MAYO restaurant in the lobby of the hotel offers guests a seasonal cuisine and local products. This hotel is connected to the Palais des Congrès and La Defense business district is only 5 minutes away by Metro. A concierge and a business centre are among the additional services. Porte Maillot Metro Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Dauphine Saint Germain
description: Nestled between Saint-Germain-des-Prés and The Latin Quarter, this boutique hotel is located in a 17th century building, a 10-minute walk from Notre Dame. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi internet access. Guest rooms at Dauphine Saint Germain are elegantly decorated and feature flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Each room has an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and rooms are serviced by a lift. Guests can enjoy a continental breakfast of fresh pastries and cereals served each morning in a breakfast room with an arched stone ceiling. A 24-hour room service is available for drinks and snacks. Dauphine Saint Germain offers free daily newspapers and a complimentary shoe shine service. Metro Station Saint-Michel is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel and offers direct access to the Montmartre District. The Louvre is a 20-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be requested at an extra charge.

name: Hotel Montparnasse Alesia
description: Located in a lively street in south-west Paris, this hotel is 600 metres from Alésia Metro Station. It has a 24-hour reception and offers soundproofed accommodation with free, unlimited Wi-Fi access. The air-conditioned guest rooms at Montparnasse Alésia are simply decorated and equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Tea and coffee making facilities are provided. The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast every morning in the breakfast room. The surrounding district offers a range of dining options catering to many tastes and budgets. Montparnasse Alésia is less than 20 minutes’ walk from La Tour Montparnasse. Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre is 2.6 km from the hotel.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Hôtel Clarisse
description: Clarisse is located in Paris, 700 metres from Parc des Expositions Exhibition Centre and 200 metres from Square Georges Brassens. This hotel was renovated in September 2018 and offers rooms with free WiFi access. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. All rooms are accessible by a lift. Breakfast is served daily in at the Clarisse’s dining room. The hotel is 350 metres from Metro Porte de Vanves, which has direct access to Invalides and Saint-Lazare. The T3 tramway stop is just opposite the hotel.

name: Hotel Albe Bastille
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this hotel is decorated with original stonework and period artwork. It has an interior courtyard and provides free Wi-Fi access. Hotel Albe Bastille is entirely non-smoking, and the air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with an LCD TV and an iPod docking station. Breakfast is served every morning at hotel Albe Bastille, and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Place des Vosges in the Marais district. The nearest Metro Station is just 250 metres away, providing access to the famous department store, Galeries Lafayette.

name: Auteuil Tour Eiffel
description: Located in the heart of the 16th-district of Paris, this modern hotel features private parking on site and a shaded terrace in the garden. It is situated 2 km from the Eiffel Tower and Bois de Boulogne and 3 km from Porte de Versailles Exhibition Centre. The rooms at Auteuil Tour Eiffel are equipped with a satellite TV, free WiFi and tea and coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer and L'Occitane free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony. A buffet breakfast including fresh bread, pastries and homemade specialities is served every morning. Organic products are available. The hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a sauna and a 24-hour fitness room. Wireless internet connection is also available in public areas. Guests can relax and enjoy a drink in the property's lounge. Auteuil Tour Eiffel is 500 metres from Mirabeau Metro Station and 600 metres from Avenue du Président Kennedy RER Train Station (Line C).

name: L'Amiral
description: Hotel Amiral is situated between the Eiffel Tower, Montparnasse railway station and Porte de Versaille Exhibition Centre which is 1.8 km from the property and can be directly accessed with public transport. It offers affordable accommodation and free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The Hotel Amiral rooms have private bathrooms and are equipped with a TV and telephone. The Amiral is conveniently situated just 250 metres from the Vaugirard Metro (line 12). The hotel is in Paris’ 15th arrondisement, which is also home to the Bourdelle Museum and The Pasteur Institute.

name: Eiffel Kennedy
description: Located in the chic 16th district in Paris, this hotel is 450 metres from the Statue of Liberty. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. The soundproofed guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Each guest room has a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at hotel Eiffel Kennedy. With a 24-hour reception, Eiffel Kennedy hotel also provides a tour desk and a ticket service. The Eiffel Tower is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Ranelagh Metro Station is 500 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. An airport shuttle is available upon request.

name: Hotel de Seze
description: Just 50 metres from the Eglise de la Madeleine and its metro stop, Hotel de Sèze offers suites and rooms set in a renovated stately townhouse. On site you will find a hammam, a fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Each air-conditioned room features free WiFi access, a desk and a 42-inch LED TV with 42 satellite channels and free video on demand. The private bathrooms have a bathtub or a walk-in shower with a rain shower-head, free luxury toiletries, bathrobe and slippers. Breakfast is served each morning in the communal lounge with an additional cost. A minibar, Nespresso© coffee machine and electric kettle are also available in each room. Several shops, restaurants and luxury boutiques can be found within walking distance from the hotel. Hotel de Sèze is 300 metres from the Opéra Garnier, 700 metres from the Place de la Concorde and 700 metres from Saint-Lazare Train Station. Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport is 22 km away.

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble. The hotel restaurant, La Brasserie du Louvre by Bocuse, was renovated in 2019 and is decorated in a traditional style with authentic features. The menu showcases iconic dishes by Bocuse, designed to delight locals and travellers alike. In the summer, meals are served on the terrace beneath the arches, with a view of the Louvre museum. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail and jazz evenings twice a week in The Bar, which features an authentic glass roof. The 4 facades and terrace of this hotel overlook the famous Louvre Museum, the Opéra Garnier and the Comédie Française theatre. During spring and summer, a picnic basket can be requested for an extra charge, so guests can enjoy picnicking in the Parisian gardens near the hotel. Several activities are available to guests of the hotel free of charge to allow guests to discover hidden gems of the city, including boules at the Tuileries Garden, guided tours of the neighbourhood and a tour of the Napoléon III-style apartments at the Louvre Museum. Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is situated 2 minutes from Palais Royal Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Place de la Bastille. Public parking is available nearby.

name: La Belle Ville
description: Located 4.9 km from Gare du Nord, La Belle Ville offers 4-star accommodation in Paris and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is situated 5 km from Gare de l'Est. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at La Belle Ville have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Pompidou Centre is 5.1 km from La Belle Ville, while La Cigale Concert Hall is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Citadines Trocadéro Paris
description: The Citadines Trocadéro Paris is located 500 metres away Trocadéro Metro Station, which leads directly to the Champs-Élysées and Galeries Lafayette department store. It offers fully equipped apartments and free WiFi. The studios and apartments at the Citadines Trocadéro Paris are air-conditioned and include a kitchen and a seating area equipped with a TV with satellite channels. The larger apartments also have a dishwasher. Guests at the Citadines Trocadéro Paris have access to additional services such as laundry, breakfast, an on-site car park and business centre. The property is a 15-minute walk from the Museum of Modern Art. These self-catering apartments are a 20-minute walk from the Musée du Quai Branly.

name: Hotel de la Tamise
description: Hôtel de La Tamise is located in Paris, just opposite the Tuileries Gardens and a few metres from the Louvre Museum. The elegantly-decorated hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a bar. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel de La Tamise have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All of the private bathroom will provide you with bathrobes, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. After a long day of sightseeing, you can sample a hot drink in the comfort of your room thanks to the electric kettle or the coffee machine. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and a laptop safe. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service and luggage storage. The hotel is 700 metres from Orsay Museum and 800 metres from Opéra Garnier. Tuileries Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides direct access to the famous Champs-Elysées.

name: La Villa Haussmann
description: Located in Paris, 1.1 km from Opéra Garnier, La Villa Haussmann boasts an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The rooms at La Villa Haussmann are equipped with a flat-screen TV and some of the rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is served daily and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Arc de Triomphe is 1.6 km from La Villa Haussmann, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.

name: Citadines Saint-Germain-Des-Pres Paris
address: 53 Ter Quai Des Grands Augustins, 75006 Paris
description: Located in the centre of Paris, Citadines Saint-Germain-des-Prés Paris is a 10-minute walk from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 300 metres from Saint-Michel Metro Station. It offers a fitness room and free Wi-Fi access. The air-conditioned studios and apartments at this property are serviced by a lift and include satellite TV. Bed linen is supplied. A private bathroom with a bath and a hairdryer is also provided. A continental breakfast is available daily with a surcharge. Each apartment or studio offers a kitchenette with a microwave, a refrigerator and a toaster. Restaurants and cafés can be found within 300 metres of the property. This residence is a 15-minute walk from the Luxembourg Gardens and the Pantheon. The Louvre Museum is 600 metres away and on-site parking is available.

name: Libertel Canal Saint Martin
description: Libertel Canal Saint Martin is located in northern Paris, near Canal Saint-Martin and Park des Buttes Chaumont, only 2 Metro stations away from Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est. The hotel spans 3 buildings, connected by a series of charming courtyards with unusual features. The air-conditioned rooms have a classical décor and provide a delightful view of the ivy-clad buildings, the Parisian facades or the inner courtyard. They are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Breakfast is served daily in the colourful breakfast room. There is a 24-hour front desk with dry cleaning and laundry services. Libertel Canal Saint Martin is 1.4 km from Belleville and Parc de la Villette is 1.7 km away. Metro Jaures is 140 metres from the hotel, which gives guests access to all of Paris famous sites.
